Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the class IIb bacteriocin
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Structure Description: No sequence homology to other known bacteriocins could be demonstrated. It also appeared that the two peptides themselves shared little or no sequence homology.
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Characterization, production, and purification of leucocin H, a two-peptide bacteriocin from Leuconostoc MF215B.
Literature.Author: Blom H, Katla T, Holck A, Sletten K, Axelsson L, Holo H.
